## MarkConfig.selectionState property

Selection state to apply for all nodes rendered with this mark config. A direct enum value can be supplied, which will apply to all nodes. Otherwise, a function can be supplied that will be invoked for each item, and should return a SelectionState for that item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectionState?: SelectionState | ((datum?: any) => SelectionState);
```
